page.title: 04Cherrington
page.content:
In{Cherrington}there are two big farms, two tied cottages and five other older houses . There are three new houses. The house belonging to the Crosses smallholding is three hundred years old and used to be an Inn.
There are{over fifty people,}and they mostly work on the farms. People go for most entertainment to{Tibberton {Institute}and they go to{Tibberton}for post office and pub. Doctor, dentist, and library are at{Newport.
{Cherrington Manor} farm house is a beautiful black and white building, and the malthouse behind is said to be the original "House that Jack built".
{Primary School}children go to Tibberton,and older ones to Newport.
